person.persName: Peter B. Bruner, Jr. (Hancock County farmer)

body.p: A Kentucky farmer. Lived in Hancock County, Kentucky in 1860. Married to Hannah Davis Bruner. Father of George W. Bruner, Cynthia E. Bruner, Davis T. Bruner, Robert T. Bruner, Henry V. Bruner, Charles M. Bruner, Martha E. Bruner, Patsey A. Bruner, Artimissa P. Bruner, and Lucretia C. Bruner. Member of the Masonic Order at Hancock Lodge, No. 115 in Hawesville, Kentucky.
